publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3724 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Remit—That the Parliament agrees that the remit of the Health and Sport Committee be amended to— To consider and report on (a) health policy and the NHS in Scotland and other matters falling within the responsibility of the Cabinet Secretary for Health and Wellbeing; and (b) matters relating to sport falling within the responsibility of the Minister for Public Health and Sport.
